root: ^My kid wants to take the day off from school.
^Tell %Pron:1:2% I’ll take off from work and we will go to the beach.
^Tell %Pron:1:2% I’ll take off from work and we will go to a basketball game
^Tell %Pron:1:2% %Pron:1:1% has to go to school and I still go to work.
^Tell %Pron:1:2% %Pron:1:1% can come in to work with me and we’ll leave early and go paintballing.

res1: ^We have a nice, relaxing day off at the beach together. I fall behind in work and also I do get sunburned.

^This was a relaxing day, it was nice to take a day off from work even if I fell behind a little bit. My kid and I bonded, but I am going to have to work extra to catch up at work, plus, I got really sunburned. Oh, the pain!
res2: ^We go to the game and have a fantastic time but we end up on TV and my boss sees and is livid I lied and said I was sick.
^This was a fantastic day, watching the game and hanging out with my kid, that is until my boss spotted us on TV. After saying I was sick, wow am I in trouble now.
res3: ^My kid gets annoyed with me because %Pron:1:1% feels like %Pron:1:1% deserves a day off, I go into work per usual.
^My kid is annoyed I didn’t let %Pron:1:2% take a day off but %Pron:1:1% really should be in school, plus I really wanted to get ahead in work and get a lot of stuff done, which I did.
res4: ^My kid enjoys coming into work with me, I get enough work done and we have a blast playing paintball!

^My kid was happy to get a day off, even if it meant spending half of it with me at work. And then we were able to skip out early and play paintball! It was great but I am in bad shape now with so many bruises!
